items.sentence: When was the last time Tom helped you do anything?
When was the last time you watched a horror movie?
Tom and Mary both know that\'s unlikely to happen.
This is the first time I\'ve seen a ship this big.
We need to think about what needs to be done next.
We plan to have an old-fashioned Christmas dinner.
I\'ll make sure that Tom does that sometime today.
Do you think you could get Tom to do that for you?
Tom and I have been close friends for a long time.
I\'m sure that Tom and Mary have been here before.
